name: Title not found (Crimes) #2022
description:
The mind of the man who dreams is fully satisfied by what happens to him. The agonizing question of possibility is no longer pertinent. Kill, fly faster, love to your heart’s content.
The case against the realistic attitude demands to be examined, following the case against the materialistic attitude.
We all know, in fact, that the insane owe their incarceration to a tiny number of legally reprehensible acts and that, were it not for these acts their freedom (or what we see as their freedom) would not be threatened.

RedemptionHours X Lucidity25
